title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds and 2 purples applied by brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow over blue for green (chintz).
description: Irregular fragment of a large scale design with tree trunk, flowers and large leaves.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds and 2 purples applied by brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow over blue for green (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-73.
